testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to be able to delete the record specified by the FAQ's id via the API connection.
testcase.name: The deletion of the desired FAQ record via the API should be verified within the API itself.
testcase.system-out: * The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token...............passed * The api user sets "api/faqsDetails" path parameters.......................passed * The api user prepares a GET request containing the Deleted id to send to the api faqsDetails endpoint..passed * The api user saves the response returned from the api faqsDetails endpoint and confirms that the status code is '404' and the reason phrase is Not Found..passed
